lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome. Thank you for joining us. Before we jump in to tonight's episode, we're going to go ahead and do some quick announcements. First and foremost, our returning sponsor and long-time partner for this campaign's beginning, on into the foreseeable future, hopefully: D&D Beyond. They've been awesome. Sam, do you have a few words you want to say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, hi! Sam Riegel, here. It's award season, so tonight I'm going to announce the D&D Beyond Awards. The envelope, please!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Paper cut.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Beginnings" is the discount code! Best URL on the entire internet? The winner is: DNDBeyond.com! Best picture--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so stupid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Old jokes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Best way to build a Blood Hunter? Activate Critical Role content on DNDBeyond.com! Best supporting actor? Sam Riegel. Best job opening at a D&D-related internet company? Front-End Developer. I guess they're looking for a front-end developer. Someone will put a URL somewhere on here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At careers.com is where you can go to the Careers tab.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, D&D Beyond, for being our official-- What are they calling it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sponsor?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, not sponsor. They're the official tool set of Critical Role.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well done! Is that the first annual--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The first annual awards show. What should we call them? Not the Oscars. The Critters. No. The Sponsees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, The Sponsees. That's fancy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was strangely manic and desperate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Isn't every awards show, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you literally write that in the bathroom six minutes ago?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam. Thank you, D&D Beyond. You can find them on DNDbeyond.com. That's DNDbeyond.com. Next up, based on tonight's episode, we'll have next Tuesday, at 7:00PM Pacific Time, here on Twitch and Alpha, Talks Machina, where members of the cast will come, with our fantastic Brian W. Foster, to discuss what transpires tonight. You get to ask questions and submit them, so do so. Asinine Wisdom, next week on Geek & Sundry Twitch, has a special guest. I believe our very own Sam Riegel will be there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're actually doing something else on the internet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I always do shows on Geek & Sundry, and this is no change. What's the show called again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Weave is really awesome. I'm really excited to see that. The podcast of episode three last week released today, so if you missed the last episode, or have friends who have been trying to keep up with the podcast, last week's episode is available for download. Once again, we have issue number four of Critical Role: Vox Machina Origins. It's available for download digitally, on Comixology, the Dark Horse app, and all other places where fine digital comic books are sold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go get it, rate it, love it. Show us that you're reading it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Burn it. Not the book, Laura's die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got to help her choose her dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No! Why would you do that? You know better!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've already cursed two of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're out. All the ones that got selected tonight are shades of pinks, purples and blues and I think it's lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a great program. Check it out at your local 826 chapter and see if you can help out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tell them you want to run a D&D game for them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think that's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was so fast, though!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The comic book is out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about our appearances coming up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two days only in Bakersfield, California. I will talk and I will go out in public.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Travis--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Travis and I--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis and I are going to be at Emerald City Comic Con the first weekend in March.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll be at Otafest in Calgary, up north, May 18th to the 20th.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep it within a few months, for the love of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And A-Kon in Texas, June 7th to the 10th. If you are anywhere near those regions. I've said before, I'm going to take this off the sheet for the future. We've said that a lot now. Hey, it's not my job to update that sheet. Anyway guys, I'll remember this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should go check out Good Fortnight Kevin on Alpha because it's a morning show and it's funny. It's dumb and it's super meta.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Super meta funny dumb show. All right. It appears that the dice have been culled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're on the last one, so we're solid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We left off as you all were finishing licking your wounds, catching your breath, and now as the moonlit night gets its darkest in the sky, you figure out what the next step is in gathering means of absolving yourselves of suspicion. As you've all now taken a moment to yourselves, you can hear the sound of the nearby crickets getting more and more deafening as the silence crawls over the center of the lake. Toya, the young girl, still lies unconscious. The remains of the devil toad, still partially burnt from the final blow delivered by Fjord, are mostly intact above its shoulders, head, and its legs. What would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ow. We're all fucked up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does anybody need any healing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, are you alive right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're up. Just barely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You need some?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm really shabby at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's too bad because I don't have any spells left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good. Let's go back and talk to the cops.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we do something with this body?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we need to bring it. I think we're going to need a trophy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about just its head?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a big head. It might be all we can take.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would it fit on the boat that we came out on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much of the body?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The whole body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole body with all of you could probably fit. It doesn't have the usual-- you could probably fit it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about just the head?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head it would probably do, but the full body, I'd have to make a few rolls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to give the body a quick search to see if there's anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I got a bunch of rings. See?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I recognize any of these rings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. That's disturbing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got one, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has the head been damaged at all, or is it mostly intact?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's mostly intact. There are a few gashes on it from the general fray, but for the most part it's still a solid head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to do some hacking?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Suppose I should.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd say you have a pretty impressive sword, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and carve off the head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's a tough form. Not only is the exterior of its flesh blubbery and a heavy rubber-like substance that is glistening with whatever mucus-like liquid it naturally produces, but then beneath it, the muscle sinew is extremely tough. It takes you the better part of 20 minutes to finally get the head entirely off the rest of the torso. It weighs enough to the point where you're going to need one or two other hands to get it anywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's an artiste at work right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's way too heavy for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all you, blue.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll help you out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to grab Toya.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Toya waking up at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Toya is passed out. You'd have to try and rouse her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's probably best not to wake her up while we're carrying this head around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's a very good idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, this is frightening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The imps burned away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, they turned to ash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he have hair? What are we carrying him by?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what are we carrying him by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Along the brow line there are these small holes that could be breathing holes. You'd have to carry it from there, under the socket, or under the jaw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because that's what you want to stick your finger in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, totally. The mucus hole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab the jaw and I say: "Hey, Jester."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did share meals with this person for two straight years. Never mind. I'm walking away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are fucking with his old co-worker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm already walking away. I took the kid and am walking to the boat.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb just retched into the grass from watching that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, let's carry him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're the worst. You're all the worst.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, I gave you the bag of skin. Don't forget you have that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have the bag of slimy skin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to salt it and hang it out to dry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it will help tomorrow or today-- what time is it? It's the middle of the night, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You approached just after dusk, so between the slow moving in there, the combat, and the rest afterward it's probably close to 10:00PM.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know exactly what time it is, don't I? Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know exactly what time it is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's something I've always been able to-- why is everybody looking at me like-- (vomiting sound)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Frumpkin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (fwoosh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Molly, as you're ahead of the group and you're making your way through the trees, Toya begins to stir in your grasp. Her eyes open a bit as you're holding her and she looks up at you, confused, eyes lolling around in the sockets for a moment before they see you and clarify. "Molly?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's been some bad business.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What happened?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) A friend turned on us, but it's going to be all right. I'm going to get you home, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait, where's Kylre?" She starts trying to fight your grasp.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll explain it later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's going to try and break free of your grasp. Are you going to attempt to hold onto her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away are they from the rest of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you guys have been doing all this, he's gone on ahead. He's probably a good 40 to 50 feet ahead. Go ahead and roll an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a monster.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tell me you did it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's not that bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Still pretty terrible.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: (chanting) Level two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You need to stop rolling that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that dice needs to go away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got some new stuff coming in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's coming across the border. It's real good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Coming in from the Feywild.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can choose athletics or acrobatics.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. Can I reroll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then that's nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That still beats her. She rolled a five. All right, wanted to double-check. She's scrambling and as you pull her back she tries to fight for a second and then goes limp in your grasp and goes, "I'm scared."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. It's going to be a bit rough, but it was for the best. I'm so sorry. Some people just turn, I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What happened?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He got sick. There was something inside him. There was something that made him do some bad things, but it had to be taken care of. You're going to be all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has a small pouch that's opened with some dried meat that he's chewing on as he's waiting. As you guys walk up, he says: "Oh, I see you've finished."

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shouting) "What in the hell is that?!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Move!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We told you we were having a party, man!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was just about to suggest covering that up, but you know, all cards on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He grabs his bag of dried meat, pulls it up, and backs up. "I didn't know-- What is that? What "did you do? What is that?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I said we were going to be doing some frog digging.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Biggest frog you've ever seen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a pause before this tiny screeching sound begins to emit from Toya. This high pitched and barely audible squeak as Toya begins to

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take off my cloak and I cover the head with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was trying to keep her away from that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to keep her away from

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We literally cut the head off Barney and shoved it in her face. (singsong) I love you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really take that in. Off to a great start.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After Jester throws her cloak over Toya--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not Toya. Over the head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to keep her quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel her body shaking against your grasp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel so bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Poor girl.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take her to the front of the boat and keep her far away from all that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull Fjord away for a moment, about ten or 15 feet away. This man in the boat has seen all of you who are supposed to be under house arrest. We cannot have him talking to the authorities.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we kill him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeez! Come here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a good feeling that this guy is a man of upstanding nature. I'm sure he'll keep it to himself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's very trusting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We gave him one bottle of wine. That's not very much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have another bottle. Don't we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you're here too, now. Great, it's a party.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could also toss him a bit of gold if we think it would make him forget the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: After all, we came to him, right? I would prefer not to use any violence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not suggesting that, but it's either violence or giving him a little something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What makes you think he's going to go talk to the authorities?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to leave it to chance?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who cares?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a small town, Beau. Everyone talks to everyone. You taught us that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did, but everyone also hated the circus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Molly, do you want to join this conversation?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been listening. I pull out a gold coin. Give him this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe one more. Or two more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull two out as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll pull three out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's recessed to the very back of his boat, wide-eyed as you approach.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're right. Coin is a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go charm him, Fjord. You're very charming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got fisherman vibes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit. Wait a minute. How long did that fight take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've returned to your normal half-orc form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, cool. Okay. There was an old man who was with us before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And now there's a little girl. It's all coming full circle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we give him the extra bottle of wine and

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Walking up to the boat--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here. (clink)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Collecting it as I go. The thing of it is, we've just done Trostenwald-- what was that? Never mind. --a great service. There was an unsavory element-- did you know the circus was in town? Doesn't matter. There was a bad fellow-- that's his head-- with them. It's no fault of theirs. You pick weird folk up on the road in the circus. Isn't that right, Mollymauk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll let that go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches over, grabs the oar from the side, and lifts the cloak off the face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's going to rile you up. That's a bad idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It doesn't look like a savory creature."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It wasn't. Trust us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Took a lot out of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But the situation in town is a little political. We're going to take this thing out of here and I'm going to report it to the authorities. We don't really want to create a stir and frighten people here. I hope you will take--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We like to be unsung heroes. You know, like superheroes with secret identities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we're an underground anonymous activist group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that helps people. But if everyone knows who we are, it'll be much harder to fight all the crime.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Try to focus on the gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He slowly reaches out and takes it from your hand. "All right. I trust it was a bad thing. So "I'm going to take you back, and then you promise I'll never see you again?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll try really hard to not let you see us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you see us, we won't make eye contact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll pretend we don't know you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That includes the goblin."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was never here. We never had this conversation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's a halfling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He glances over and takes a closer look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm very ugly for a halfling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's just get back to shore." He grabs the oar, takes the bottle of wine that he had mostly drunk by himself before, and polishes it off in one series of gulps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't boat drunk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all gather up onto the ship, he begins to paddle you back towards the western shore of the Ustaloch to the outskirts of Trostenwald.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When we get to the shore, we should probably split up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are we going to get this giant head to the authorities?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I got an idea! Why don't you go get a wagon as soon as we get to shore, and we'll help you load it onto the wagon, and then you just take it on in yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a shame we didn't just get rid of a wagon not more than one night ago.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do we need to take it with us? Us traipsing through town with a giant head seems like it would draw focus. Why don't we just put it somewhere and send the authorities out here to find it later?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone else may get to it, or something might happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are they going to do with it? It's a big head!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could leave someone with it, and we can just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could stand guard as a crownsguard next to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What could people do with the head of a creature like this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What could people do with the head of a creature like this? Who knows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would I know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They could make a lot of soup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They could turn it in for-- there's a lot of poor folk here. If they had a large looking odd creature, that's worth some gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can hide it. Maybe some of us have skills to hide things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think Fjord had a good idea, which is if you can disguise yourself as a crownsguard again, you wait with it. You guys get back to the tavern, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can go and alert the authorities.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now, here's the thing. I may be speaking out of turn-- I know I don't know you very well, but it feels like the thing that we all share in common here is that we don't wish to make-- maybe not you-- make a big splash here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Agreed. The less attention, the better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you know, whatever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The less attention, the better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so maybe I'm 70 to 80 percent correct, but we're all in this together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And gold. I like getting paid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to get this one back to the circus, too. You might be helpful for that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to make a big thing. I'm going to go the authorities, to-- my keen mind tells me that woman's name was--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the-- sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, the one who wanted to go eat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you're talking about--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Norda?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, Lawmaster Norda.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Norda? I want to go to her and citizen's arrest kind of thing. Keep it quiet, don't need big accolades, will take gold, and then I'll bring that back and we can divvy that up. That's no problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like it. As soon as other crownsguard arrive with Norda and the rest of whoever you bring to the scene, maybe I can go with you and help return Toya.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You disappear quickly, because if you get drawn into that investigation, it would be bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, and if nobody recognizes you-- Do you remember any of the guards that were in town that you could make yourself look like specifically?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that guy's name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What were the two guards that keep coming to the tavern?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wait!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We wrote their names down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jonas and Lucas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: The Jonas Brothers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not related at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, question. The two zombified back at the circus tents, were they burnt to a crisp beyond recognition?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them was, and they have been discovered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but was he recognizable? Did we leave him looking like that dude at the end of The Last Crusade after he drank from the wrong cup?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With some time, he could be identified.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, the Jonas Brothers it is, friends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to game this out. You, Caleb, someone who is not suspected of a crime, is going to bring the severed head of a member of the circus to the police--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's going to go to the police and bring them to the head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Either way. You, Caleb, someone who is not suspected of a crime, is going to point the police to the severed head of a member of the circus with no evidence showing what that thing was or that it was evil, and that will somehow not implicate other people who were not with us at the time. How is this going to prove their innocence, just showing a head?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They already believe that the circus is terrible. I think they were just going to confirm their own suspicions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, Toya. If she would speak honestly, she would absolve all of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Without Toya's testimony we're in trouble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm hoping Toya will--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's a sticky situation. Because what if she talks about my friends who were there with me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She knows what to say when guards are asking questions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It looks like she knows how to go off like a siren.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's had a bad night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm at one hit point, I understand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll have a talk. We'll get her to some people who can calm her down and make sure she remembers how we take care of each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If there's something you want to ask me, I'm right here." You're all in this boat as it makes its way across the Ustaloch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry, dear. I was hoping that we didn't have to have this conversation in front of strangers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can someone please explain to me what's going on?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you explain to us, maybe, your relationship with Kylre? If that was his name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, that's the name I've ever known."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's talk about the killing part, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know anything about that. When we did the show the other night, the horrible man--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It turns out that that was-- Kylre did that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's hurt and killed a lot of people. We think that maybe he's been making you sick too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever heard him say nergaliid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. Where's Gustav?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gustav is having trouble with the authorities. We're going to need to all work together to save him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unfortunately, the authorities think that Gustav and the circus are responsible for what happened. Actually, it's just Kylre. He wasn't what you thought he was, I'm afraid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The twins are being the twins, Ornna's being Ornna. But I think we can save everybody. We just need to take care of each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He was my friend, though."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Child, how did you grow so close to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gustav put us together for our act and he protected me. I felt safe around him. He didn't "let anybody get too close I didn't want to."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did he communicate with you in some way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He talked."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you talk about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we talked about everybody else in the family. We talked about how I missed not having a "family. He didn't talk about himself much, but it was mainly just little games."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he teach you how to sing to affect people's minds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. That was how I got by before I met these guys."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am sure this is painful for you. You are young. Sometimes people we feel we know can be someone else. Regrettably, this is one of those instances. He was a dangerous thing. It is very important that this is buried here. You want to travel on with the circus and with Mollymauk and your friends. That thing tried to kill us. It did kill things in Trostenwald. Who knows what it would have done to you, child?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oof.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's not good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I felt it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's Sam good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is only a six. Rolled very low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch her curl back into herself and get quiet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It might do for you to apologize.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry for what, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I want to hear this too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry for choking you with my stick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somehow that was better than what I was hoping for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rated T for Teen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'll never do it again? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'll never do it again. As long as you don't try that again, of course, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was only because Kylre was trying to kill us and she was afraid that you were helping him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I wasn't trying to hurt you. I was just trying to get you to stop singing. But it was so abrasive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know how people outside can be. The mean girl was just afraid of you and we're going to let her go on this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm tired."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I know. Let's get you home, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She leans into you, Molly. After a few minutes, she falls asleep against you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That went well, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Choked you with my stick?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She apologized for exactly what she did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was certainly memorable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, we're here." The boat hits the edge of the dock. He hops off and pulls the rope up. Slowly manages the boat over to the side of the dock, ties it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many people are around the dock right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no boats at the dock that are being manned currently. There are a few boats out on the water that you saw in the distance. There are some night fishermen. There's nobody immediately in the vicinity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to hop off the boat and break eye contact with the captain of the boat so that I can Disguise Self into a crownsguard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I talk to him while you do that. You have your wine, you have your gold. Thank you very much, it is much appreciated. It was a lovely trip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes that's fine. Just, please, get out of my boat."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (English accent) Who goes there? What is this, what have you brought?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I have felled a beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They got in my boat. I-- they--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you responsible for this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. They took over my boat and forced me to take them to the middle island there."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You will not take credit for my kill. I have killed this thing and I want it to be watched. I am going to the authorities. We will bring them back and get this sorted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a horrifying-looking creature. You are to be commended for your bravery. Lawmaster Norda will want to know about this immediately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You weren't here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check with advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is so weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just holding a bowling ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good night." He helps each of you quickly get off the boat. Ties and locks it up and makes a beeline--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, we can't waste any time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I lob the head up over the side of the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Monster calves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're strong, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but at level two you need to roll higher than a three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get it partway up and it begins sliding back into the boat and plops into the boat and goes (bouncing) and you have to catch yourself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tongue and mouth just (lolling).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's terrifying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I need help. It's still covered, don't worry. She can't see what we're doing, it's covered with my cloak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll help you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By the way, it's a little tiny cloak. It's like a half cape so it's like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like a napkin on a buffalo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A doily on a couch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll help you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to squish you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all right, I'm strong. One, two, three!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually you guys get it up onto the dock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly, do you intend to keep Toya here or do you need to take her back?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take her right back. No one can know that she's been anywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is correct. Take her and sequester her with the family so not a peep gets out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll explain to her what needs to be done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do we trust you all won't skip town in the middle of the night?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We still have people in the lockup.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gustav's in jail still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some people are loyal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be back and I have to show back up with you people anyway. I'm going to get her as quickly as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you guys are doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is not very stealthy here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm keeping watch over the toad head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a plus six to my stealth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wouldn't say no to it before I take off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh that's true, you're sneaking back to the carnival. I give you a nice little blessing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't come to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not coming with you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not this time. It's not-- you know why.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've had a terrible night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If any problem should arise, I'll send Frumpkin straight away to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless you're dead. No one's going to be around to save you if you get into trouble.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm almost dead already.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's not good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not comforting, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It has been you and me, now it is you and me and them. Okay? You're with your blue friend here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can hold my hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll be back. I'm just going to have a conversation. We have gotten out of prisons before, you and I. I'm not worried about that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her hands are very warm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm warm blooded.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, she was just holding the throbbing head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, you were too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. But I didn't have my fingers in the holes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I leave my cloak here over the head, sir, good sir, guard man?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's fucking me, right? We know it's still me. I'm right here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not RPing still?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can do what you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I leave my cloak here or should I take it with me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, I'll make a dramatic flourish of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just make sure you bring it back home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like the cloak is identifying to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take it with you, scratch that. Good idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like where did this really pretty pink and lavender cloak come from?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's green.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry, green. I haven't looked at the art.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's nighttime, the moonlight makes everything sort of look purple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's canon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, go quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we stealth away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is my stealth bonus now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just get advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to you in just a second. The rest of you guys make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't need to cause I'm just taking a stroll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. For those of you who are--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep, that's my girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you make your way into the alley a voice goes, "Excuse me." The three of you glance over and you see a crownsguard at the end of the alley that's currently there with his arms crossed. "Can I help you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is our back to him still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's to the side. You guys are all looking up at the rope now and he's to the right of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it still dark out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. It's close to midnight at this time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. Has anybody seen my shoe that I dropped earlier around here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I immediately drop to my knees and start looking for a shoe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you say a shoe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like for you to make a-- (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You turned into Mr. Rogers?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A shoe!?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like for you to make a deception check, with disadvantage please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My shoe!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Beau's on the ground frantically searching for a shoe and Nott's there in the darkness, the guard with his arms crossed goes (whistles). He begins to walk and approach you as two more guards close off the other side of the alley and they begin to come up to you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far away are they from me? Too far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Too far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Drop one of those rings, drop a ring!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not a shoe! I drop a ring. Wait, did we take a short rest when we were on the boat? We did. It was a short rest on the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get across, I would say I'd allow a short rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Behind the guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check to see if they notice you suddenly casting a spell, or a spell-like effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please please please. Natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh God. Oh, she doesn't make a sound, does she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's double-check this new ability that I'm getting used to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think she makes any noise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can she tap?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if she can cast through her, then I can imagine she can make contact because she casts on touch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You create an illusory duplicate of yourself. It is an illusion, it cannot make actually physical contact with anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, if she's behind one of the guards then two of the other guards can see her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We took a short rest on the thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say on the boat across the river, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you want to hit dice it up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can roll one hit die. He's rolling commando. He don't want it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, you Invoke Duplicity and you appear behind him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. My duplicate is going to jump up and down and start flailing her arms and then run down the alley around the building.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to kill these fucking guards, don't we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard sees something quickly dart into the shadows and continues walking towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, come on!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just go with it, go with it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see that behind you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard approaches and goes, "It seems that you have been out and about when you were "supposed to be within the inn."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Found it! The ring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my ring. I dropped it out the window.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She calls it a shoe, it's a shoe ring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like to wear them on my toes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three more guards have now approached from the front of the building and they approach and begin pulling out manacles and chains and say, "We're going to have to take you to the stockade."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, please don't. Really, we just left the building because we wanted to go--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're being locked up right now, as we speak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the stupidest thing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So stupid!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Level two!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to go, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I was just a bystander! I was walking down here and I saw these two ruffians and I was going to go get help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's actually true, she wasn't with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You rolled a zero?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's your modifier, negative two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three minus three is zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That went into my nose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brave new world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're telling him this, your mask goes (creak). He goes, "Arrest that creature!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to die from bad paperwork.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we really are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Literally, we're going to die from bad paperwork.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both are put in chains. You're put in chains both arms and legs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's just mean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Racism!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mollymauk. I need you to make a stealth check with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys slowly make your way through the low grass over towards where the outside of the carnival is. As you approach, you can see there's about five crownsguard that are making rounds around the outside. It looks like where previously they had been keeping watch over the people that were there, since the murder of two of their own, it has heightened the intensity of the watch. It looks like it's fairly well watched. You get the sense, at a distance, that you would have a hard time getting in there. You can try and sneak her in and sneak out, but it seems dangerous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, shite. Not even a good push to get her underneath, just back into one of the tents, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I don't know they're caught, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have no idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's all get caught.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and wait for an advantageous moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sisters ran. They fled. You don't see any sign of Desmond or Ornna. Make one more stealth check, for the two of you, with advantage because you still have the ability. You're at the cusp end of it though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to pace yourself, just carefully wait for the right moment, dart out of the grass having her under your arm and she's like, "What? Why? What is going on?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You remember. Nothing happened. Find Ornna. You didn't see me. You just hid and waited and you didn't know that anything was wrong. If people ask, unless you hear from me, you don't know anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." You slip her into the tent and back out, none the wiser.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start heading back to the inn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just waiting?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm not waiting. I'm going to see Norda, so I'll see you shortly. Be ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You make your way to the stockade. As you approach and make your way into the interior, the two crownsguard at the front say, "Hold. What's your business?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excuse me, and I lurch and prop myself up against a wall and push back. Excuse me. I just had a very harrowing night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have you been drinking?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You get me Norda this very minute and I will tell you what has happened with this circus and in this town and don't keep me waiting another minute. I'm bleeding out here. Arschloch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just keep it in the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wish I had gone with that because it was great there but it's not great here. That is a nine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is indeed. He sits there and glares down at you for a second, your posturing, this filthy, scruffy man in a coat that wandered up out of nowhere covered in a little bit of his own blood. He just looks down at you for a second, "Sorry. She's done for the night."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They keep regular hours here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They are innocent. I have evidence that I can show her. This whole thing can be solved now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This whole thing can be solved first thing in the morning. I'll let you sleep it off. Have "some water. Come back when you're feeling a little more yourself."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill them all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I draw back, and flames burst forth!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get the message to her that the head of the circus frog is at the docks, waiting for her inspection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you hear a voice on the inside, just like, "Good night, good night" and a cloaked figure exits the front doorway, roughly about four and a half foot tall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I remember the height.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Norda is off the clock and is currently leaving for the evening to return to her home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shouting) There is a circus toad's remains at the docks! I would like to put this town's fears to rest. I am looking for-- What's her name? Yorda.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Norda.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Norda. Yorda's at the inn. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's Norda and then Yorda because I like to make it as confusing as possible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Liam's memory is really spotty, but Caleb's is rock-solid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's funny. When you spell things on paper, they seem so much different and when you say them out loud they're like, "Ah, they're very similar." The figure stops and turns and you hear this audible (heavy sigh). The figure waddles over towards you and pulls the hood back and it's Norda. "All right, what's this about a frog head?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Forgive me, I can see that you're trying to get yourself home to bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be preferable, aye." You see bags under her eyes. She's had a long day, her hair's a bit frazzled, and she looks like she's waiting for you to finish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are very aware that there are people at the Nestled Nook under house arrest by your order? They are innocent and I can prove it, and I would like to end things as quickly as possible. I have killed one of the circus folk this evening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now this'll be real interesting." She looks past you, and you follow her eyeline, and there you hear the sound of chains as a handful of crownsguard with Jester, Beau, and Nott, in manacles, approach from behind. "These ones, you're talking about, right?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I staked out the circus because my friends were in trouble, and wrongly accused, and I knew this. So I staked out the circus this evening, and watched as this toad thing left the grounds there. It did this to me, and I, in a rage, followed it and destroyed it, and I will show you the remains of my work. We'll put it to bed. I'm either a clown or I'm a toad-killer. Let's see what it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, you fucker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, goddamn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, (sighs) "Hold onto them for just a moment." She walks back inside. A moment passes, and she returns with four other guards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I keep doing this so I can make a jingling sound with my chains.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, that's probably agitating the issue. Let's go to the docks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She comes up. "All right. Drag them along with us. Show us what this thing is, and if what "you say is not true, you'll join them. How's that sound?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm good with these terms. Follow me please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't know where you went.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am not going to answer her. I'm just walking very firmly, with purpose, to the docks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has been close to an hour at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I can clock that, I would like to leave the head, move off into the shadows, and assume my older man form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using your second slot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I can just drop--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, you can do this whenever, that's right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll drop the crownsguard, and make the old man and sit so I can keep an eye on it, but away from it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you guys are led up to the docks, where you guide them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Moment of confusion-- here it is, right here, where I left it. Nobody has tampered with it. I turn around and I pull back my clothing and show a huge slash across my body, and say: You see this? It was done by this thing. (whoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you pull back and reveal the face, its jaw is relaxed now, its muscles have sat now that it's been left in the dock, and it's pooled at its base. This old pumpkin look. Its tongue's lolling out and unraveled on the ground, what remained within its salivary glands has soaked the remaining wood around its base. One of the eyes has rolled back, but it's a horrible display. The guards take a step back immediately at the reveal, and Norda immediately gets interested, gets close, takes a look at it, and begins prodding a bit with her finger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is as bad as it looks, and if you have any holy people in this city, they will confirm that this thing is fiendish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "You say it's a fiend? Because what this looks like is you just murdered one of our "possible witnesses and/or other members of this investigation, so I'm hoping this is a fiend. I "don't know fiends."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hope you don't believe that I slashed open my own body and then went to the police.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Honey, I've been doing this for a long time. I've seen stranger. Hold on just a second." She calls one of the guards over, whispers to him for a second. He rushes off. "Just so happens we have "someone in town who might be able to confirm this for us, might help your case."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, they will be here shortly."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I sit down on a crate and I stop talking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and this awkward period of time with the guards all just standing there, holding you as you wait patiently. Some of them are tapping their fingers. You start rattling your chains and two guards pull the chains taut so you can't do it anymore. Mollymauk, as you begin to make your way back into town, because you're making your way through the dock district along the lakeside and you look up ahead, and you can see there's a couple of torches being held by crownsguard right where the head was left, and you can see Caleb, and then three of your allies in chains.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hmm. (sighs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! What are you going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get a little closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been more than a hour.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to take a look at what is actually going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not to get too close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not too close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's not a high DC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully it's nighttime, it's pushing midnight at this point. Because you're ostentatiously dressed, but there isn't a lot of light in your colors. As far as you know right now, no one can see you, you're too far away to hear much, but you can keep an eye on them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, what's the play? What's the play? Ah! I'm going to-- Yeah, fuck it. I'm going to walk up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) They're already in trouble, apparently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I love when they do this! Chain him up." You are shackled as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Less questions to answer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Norda is starting to smile a bit. She's like "Man, if we could have more criminals like you lot, my job would be far easier. I would get home a lot earlier."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not criminals! We're not! Me and Caleb were just travelling ever since we broke out of that-- Nothing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dance number.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's good that you try so hard to protect the rights of giant frog creatures. I'm very impressed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fiend creatures specifically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's another figure walking up behind him, also jogging. You can see light gray hood and cloak around and as the figure approaches into the torch light, pulls back the hood, and you see this long shoulder length curled blond hair. A very very delicate looking elven male, who approaches. "I believe I've been summoned, Norda?" "Yes sorry, this is Archivist Zeenoth. He's been in town for a few days and he comes from the library that knows a lot about a lot of things. I hope that he can help us in this. Zeenoth, they're calling this thing a fiend. What do you know about this?" He steps closer, kneels down next to the head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Xhorhas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just whisper Xhorhas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, these creatures do frequent Xhorhas." He gives some look over, pulls a small book out of his side pouch. Begins to thumb through it, compares a few things. "I'm not a specialist, unfortunately. This creature is very much a very dangerous entity from the far east. I'm surprised it made it this far into civilization before being destroyed. It's a good thing it has been." He now gets to look at everyone, over the crew and goes, "Are you the ones who slew it?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh well technically it was Caleb, technically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the figure looks over and stops on Beau and kind of smiles.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on over there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh sorry, I just have back issues. I'm just stretching.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes it was difficult, but I prevailed in the end. The city is safe. What library was that that you mentioned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh I'm an archivist. I'm the archivist of the Cobalt Soul."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here in town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I'm from Zadash. I'm a bit out of my depth at the moment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What brings you this far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I have business." At this point Norda goes, "All right you know what? This is some serious bullshite. We're all just chilling here at the docks, we have confirmed that's a fiend."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The nergaliid!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A nergaliid! Bring them back to the stockade. Let's have a trial." They begin to pull you guys back to the stockade. Two of the guards grab the nergaliid head and they begin dragging it along, and you guys are all being pulled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You will find I have marked a page in there. It will describe this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are benches built. There is a central kind of a pit. There's about four or five steps down into this pit. Then above that is a desk where Norda takes as the law master. As you step in you realize, oh this is a room of judgement. What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to try, once they start making their way back to that facility, to quickly make my way to the inn, if I can as the old man, enter, make my way into the restroom, drop my disguise, come back out as Fjord. Oh the water closet, what have you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a shared water closet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just a pot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the room with the pot in it. Then make my way back to the front door, stick my head out where the guards are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of them have already left because they're carting off the rest of your friends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please, I can't seem to find any of my comrades. Have you seen where they have gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look at each other. "Yeah, they've been arrested."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was afraid as much. Could I make my way down to where they are being held? I would like to be present, if it would be prudent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You leave our watch, we cut you." They both flank you side to side and push you ahead a little bit. They are glued to your right and left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very kind of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They lead you to the stockade. As you guys are brought into this chamber, Norda sets up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who is going to go get the little girl?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're the little girl here. You're confused. It's been a night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Showing up just to get arrested!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Welcome to the club!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Breaking the law, breaking the law!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lot of help you were!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Welcome to the chain gang.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That one was caught fleeing from the scene."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, that's completely a misunderstanding of things. That's not what happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the next bit of evidence you want to present, please? Anyone?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, first a question. Are you familiar with Occam's Razor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I figured. Okay. That one works for the circus. Do I look like I work for the circus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Strangely, not well dressed enough."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. I'm a dirty hobo and I reek like yesterday's garbage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wasn't going to go that far, but I'll admiss it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. This one, does he look like a circus performer? Is he filthy like me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which one?" Fjord has not arrived yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But he's right here! Look, I can touch him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the purposes of that, as you say that and reveal your hand, Fjord enters through the door like it was a planned arrival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Weirdly, he's dripping wet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Baby oil.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The sardonic one, right? With the shit-eating grin. Does she look like she works for the circus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know what she works for, but I don't trust her."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's smart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one is a nincompoop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, which one were you pointing at?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's you. I pull the mask away. This is my good friend. She's a goblin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A little halfling girl!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you watch her pull back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I step in front of her. She is my friend and colleague and you will not lay a hand on her while I am standing here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (chanting) Level two!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (chanting) Shitty dice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her eyes are chained onto this goblin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's looking into my chest because Nott is behind me. I'm sorry, I'm confused why you're going to such lengths to defend the rights of this large, oversized frog skull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I defend no rights of this creature! I've been in this office long enough to know that there aren't usually solo workers on something like this. I know these folk. They all protect each other. Who's to say this wasn't their whole reasoning for coming anyway, and something went wrong, and they're letting him take the fall?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a big conspiracy to make undead crownsguard here in the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't fucking know! Don't tell me how I do my business! Sit the fuck down! Who's next?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's absolutely true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let him up." They loosen the chains and you get to stand and approach a bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a common tactic. It's a good way to make your way through this world. Normally it works. We assumed, the circus, anyway, that we were being framed. We were protecting our own. Is the head in here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This one showed his true colors, and then we took care of it. I'm going to throw one of my swords down on the ground that is filthy with its blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Why did this one run?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) I mean--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like I didn't need to be in there anymore. You know. I don't-- ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you both to make persuasion checks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, shit. 12.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We needed someone on the outside. We knew we were innocent. We knew you didn't think so. We just assumed you were going to have us all executed and we didn't do anything. What would you have done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is that goblin pissing in my court?" (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry! I'm really nervous!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In his defense, it's a wonderful vintage. Her defense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm very nervous. I'm sorry, it's just your guards shackled both my wrists and my ankles and I can't move to get into a good position.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, when she's nervous she aerates her bladder, all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We helped the killing of the creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Convince me why I shouldn't hang you tomorrow."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry for your loss. Where are your people from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Grimgolir."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not where my clan's from. I had nothing to do with it. My clan operates far, far away and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where does your clan operate from?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking on the map. Near the Felderwin Tillage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's not too far. Maybe we'll send some folks to pay a visit to your clan."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can. Feel free. I'll even tell you where they are. I'm no longer associated with them and I can help you hunt them down if you'd like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but you didn't roll a one. He rolled a four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not a natural one.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Not a natural one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sigh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God, why are we rolling so bad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She leans back. "I want to sleep. I think you're telling the truth. Most of you. Archivist, does this resonate with you as well? Does this check out, lore-wise? I don't know what the fuck you do." The Archivist is like, "I believe based on what they've stated, at least it's consistent though I'm a bit confused as to the demeanor of the goblin. It's not unheard of to have goblin kin turn against their own. There have been a number of historic individuals of various monstrous races who have been beneficial members of society."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I invite Nott up to my piggy-back position on my shoulders.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't, she's chained up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I scoop her up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is even more awkward. Just put me back down. Put me back down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just let it happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! The chains are pulling me one way and you're pulling me the other way. Just come down to my level! Come down here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Including the goblin."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Thank you! I would kiss you if I could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would not recommend trying. Okay. Gustav, what's-- I can't read your last name. You've been given quite a debt for Trostenwald so you shall remain here until you've worked off the debt to the city. To the number of 2,645 gold pieces. To make up for the deaths of our two crownsguard, of the two civilians who have died, and the general cost of this entire investigation. We'll consider what your work is to the city tomorrow. However, the rest of you: you're free to go. I'm going to go get myself some sleep."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I have my book back, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes her armor off. "(sigh) All right. I'm going to get a drink." She puts her cloak on and then hops off. With the imposing sight of her on top of a large pedestal and desk, she hops down to her natural dwarven height and it's almost adorable to watch her just skitter the hell out of there. She's done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are you getting a drink at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no response.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want company?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just turn to the nearest crownsguard and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chains are removed. They free everybody, including Gustav, but two guards are assigned to him to keep an eye over him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As soon as Beau gets out of her chains, I grab my stuff and I leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you are exiting the stockade, in the archway of the doors right outside, you see another figure standing hood up-- like a short hood with a mantle that stops about midway. Bare arms and dark skin, baggy gray pants and is there, waiting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the mantle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a cloaked figure there, waiting, looking right at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he blocking the doorway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is just beyond the doorway. It's not blocked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there another way out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you can exit. They're just on the other side of the door. Every other way in, you don't know the stockade well and all of it just leads further into the stockade. There are other crownsguard inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm just going to try and just bolt through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just going to bolt? Full run?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not run, just you know, Irish goodbye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. As you briskly exit and turn to the left, the figure intervenes and side steps right in front of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I recognize him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You don't see much of the face. The hood is up and a little bit of the moonlight is coming, you can see the edge of features. The body is muscular, but thin. Looks not terribly masculine or feminine, but it looks able and it moved at a very quick speed to intercept your positioning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just go: Oh, fuck! Turn around and walk back in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll join everyone else. I flick off the guy on my way back in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys are being escorted out of the stockade, Beau comes back in and joins you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just had to pee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shame.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, you guys, we're town heroes! What's it feel like?

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha, it's very good to see you again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's good to see you guys, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where did you go? Were you on the lam for a long time?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a little bit of a problem with authority and I didn't want to be caught in a small and confined space and then that ended up happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been in there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Immediately after I ran away. They sent out horses. I'm not that fast, but I did fuck up a few of the guards. "By accident. "

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say that, you hear a couple (clears throat) and two of the crownsguard visibly bruised that are escorting you guys out into the night air before they eventually leave you to your own devices.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly, what do you think this means for the carnival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. That is a question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if Gustav has to stay here then who's going to run it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a lot of gold. That's like a life sentence worth of gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gold comes, gold goes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much do you think the circus has?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know how much the circus has and, honestly, I think Ornna would lie about it if we asked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, thank you everyone for helping. That could "have been a lot worse. And, you know, it's fine. I know it's a lot of money, but shouldn't take me "more than a few years. It's a nice town! Trostenwald is a nice town!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not that nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, it's not, but you know, it's better than prison."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a lot of beer here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That there is. I may have to start a small fund for that on its own."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happens to the circus, because, you know, you can't do the same show for the same people for a year?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where's Ornna? Where's the twins? Where's--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, the twins buggered. Ornna? God only knows.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where's Toya?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very shaken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, Gustav just begins making a beeline for the circus. Bosun goes, "Oh." (sighs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How hard can it be to make 2,000 gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know how much he saved. Nowhere near that much, probably."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How hard can it be to steal 2,000 gold?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how many people around here have that much. Although, the breweries might.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe be best to find that gold elsewhere.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, so who killed him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll take care of it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Suppose we should take a look at what's left of the circus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go take a look around? Do I see Zeenoth anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, god damn it, it was almost better. It was almost good. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? You don't see anybody immediately around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that Archivist Zeenoth that was outside?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Archivist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I said. Was that who it was that was like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Zeenoth was still inside the courtroom when you were leaving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Different guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, who was it that was outside?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't know, we didn't see him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's very late, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's post-midnight now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so tired.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't suppose you want to retire for the evening? Share a drink together now that this is somewhat behind us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
