lines.text: I will definitely drink. I think we should probably drink at our camp then. I'm fine inviting them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tell you what. As a thanks, we'll grab Toya. We'll meet you guys-- where are you all staying?"

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: The Nestled Nook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll come meet you at the Nestled Nook and I'll get a round for you all. As a thank you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this a human thing to-- never mind

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're just like tieflings, we're all alike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Bosun, come on." They make their way off to the carnival camp.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kylre went bad. Maybe he'd already always been bad, I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, he attacked us. A lot of guards, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was an evil fiend. When he joined the circus, who brought him in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not be throwing words around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he was literally an evil fiend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He summoned imps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He did summon--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He summoned imps, Yasha!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He controlled the girl!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was fine for years. Something set him off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, he said it himself, you people in the circus are weird, right? So, every once in a while, a glitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A glitch? What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was fine for so long. There was nothing for so long. Why? Things don't just...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still think there's something creepy about this lake, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It gives me the heebie jeebies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything gives me the heebie jeebies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if it is this thing that we've read about in the book, then perhaps he needed to feed more or was impatient for some reason?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's happened with Toya?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shite.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How is she?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She is not good. She is taking it as you would expect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also Beau crushed her windpipe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true. With her stick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And, I'm sorry, are we also taking the bouncer into our little coven of weirdos. Is that a thing that's happening?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, well--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I kind of go on my own, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, she's one of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's the charm, she has to come!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm too tired to argue. Let's get that drink.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See, charm. Drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you make your way back to the Nestled Nook Inn, within the tavern, and within the next hour or so, Gustav and Bosun, Toya and Ornna all come in and join you. You guys crowd a few tables together, and under what is generally a pretty empty tavern this night, you guys, for the most part, dominate the center space.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, Yasha, for new patrons, you're going to have to surrender your sword.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughs) You're very funny.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is very funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a very sick burn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Speaking of swords--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Careful Fjord, we haven't been healed yet, you know. She could take you down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You could always try to take it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Arm wrestle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could, couldn't I?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Arm wrestle!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You do look pretty strong. I mean, you're just a little bit bigger than me, but I still think I could probably take you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Looks could be deceiving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Arm wrestle! Bets on Yasha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it! Arm wrestle!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just thought it would be a nice gesture.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To arm wrestle?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, to give up her sword.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What about your sword?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm a paying patron here. They know me

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So? You've got to be putting something on the table, though. Well, if you want to surrender the sword or not surrender the sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you want to stay in that room any longer, Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) Never.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what we're talking about anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't either.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get a drink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you guys going to arm wrestle?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. How about "Boulder, Paper, Shears"? Wait, what is it? "Boulder, Parchment, Shears"!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a stupid game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I never heard of that game.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it's something that kids play. I have a better version of that game. We can play it later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives a brief pat and side hug to Bosun before standing up and leaving. Gustav stands up and looks around. "I'm sorry for everything. For all the pain this has caused you, for all the pain it's caused you." Looks at Toya, "For all the pain it's caused you, little one."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We had quite the adventure, actually. I know people were hurt, but that was really something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And apparently, nobody really cared about Enon, so that's, you know, good for your conscience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Everyone's conscience is heavy with its own reasoning."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Get no blame from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate that. We are our own worst enemy, are we not?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, cheers to that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I catch Nott's eye and silently mouth the word 'lunatics'.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I think that's the end of my carnival." (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was such a good carnival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was a good run! It was a really good run."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, we caught the last show, you guys!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not our best show.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I liked it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The tickets are probably worth something!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They might!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Closed it down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm gonna keep this flyer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have plans?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I'm just going to float around like I usually do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, I'm thinking about it. I don't know where I'm going to end up now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You can go with Bosun and Ornna, if you like. You guys are still carrying on. I mean, I'm not going to keep the tent, I'm not going to keep the supplies. I might hock some of it to try and pay off my debt, but-- take what you want. Start anew. It's my gift to you." They all kind of, "Thank you very much. We'll start small, I don't think we need too much of the ensemble. How we began, back up in Shady Creek."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like the biggest one? I would take that off your hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The biggest one's a bit--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What would you do with a really large tent?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, I could open up a hotel? Or I could make a bunch of dresses. Or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Out of the tent?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could make a lot of dresses out of that tent. That's fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right? It's really pretty fabric.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) A hot air balloon!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those aren't invented.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Haven't you seen airships?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They generally run from crystals. I've seen that kind before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, there's no balloons, though. What's a balloon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have simple dirigibles, but they're not very functional.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it just involves fire you guys. We can figure this shit out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, a dirigible? Dirigible I've heard of, but a balloon? I don't know what that is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have the airships made it to this continent yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think, Jester--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've seen airships, okay? I've seen them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester, I think it's safe to say that this first case is closed!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we could open some sort of private investigation service.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what we should do!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Out of a tent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's not open it here, though. This town sucks!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we were still planning on moving on after this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bosun and Ornna, you guys can use that tent, right?" "Yeah, I think we'll take the tent." "All right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw, they took the tent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw. We waited too long!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got to jump on the tent when it becomes available.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, just out of curiosity, what's everybody plan to do now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well do we have to leave? I mean I'm not wanted anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were never wanted. Back to my question--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord and I are going to try and get him into the Academy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I wanted to find out more about the Soltrice Academy, yes. I didn't know what direction you were heading. I never even asked what you were doing here in the first place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you know, I'm just doing a walking tour? Through the continent, just kind of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A walking tour?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, just like a backpack vacation, you know? Just stretch my legs a little bit. Meeting some fine people. Discovering myself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you on a vacation?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bring a lot of money with you for that vacation, did you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's it matter to you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't believe you're on vacation. Where are you going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) That's your problem. So, you guys going to take off or do you guys want company or-- ?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gustav finishes the drink and goes, "Well, I'm going to go get some sleep and try and figure out how to put my life together. I bid you all a wonderful night--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gustav, wait! Here. And I take off one of my rings. This is an old family heirloom, and I hope it can help you pay some of your debt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to spy the rings on her hand, by the way, really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Looks just like the one I lost off my pinky."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's so weird that you and my family have the same looking ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's wonderful, thank you so much."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's very sweet."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to look at the other rings she picked up, not that she's wearing right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're right here. You can get a look at them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all over her fingers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They are obviously rings from random dead people, aren't they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm just putting that together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I play dinosaur fights.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gustav puts his hat on. "Yasha, be safe, and punch anyone who gets in your way."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mollymauk, I hope you find what you're looking for."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To the new family, don't make the same mistakes your forefathers did. The rest of you, thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) He said forefathers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I bid you all adieu," and he exits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you looking for, Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Toya.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bosun and Ornna stood up and Toya is there, "Yeah?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are your plans? What do you want to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I figure I'll just move on with Bo and Ornna and make a new show. Something with a little less death. That's what I'd like."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should make your way to the Menagerie Coast. I think you guys would have a lot of success in Nicodranas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't been to Nicodranas."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks up and tugs on the side of Bosun's sleeve. "You know, I actually haven't been there either."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You would do well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm. Let's go ahead and make our way. That sounds like a nice change of pace, and this empire is getting a little stuffy for me anyway."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've bend down to Toya, and I take off one of the little jade bangles around my wrist, and I say, "Here. This will keep you safe from assholes named Beau. Except for that asshole, named Bo. He's a good Bo, but all other assholes named Beau."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Ornna elbows him and is like, "Oh, no, he's an asshole too. It's fine."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. Sorry again about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes it and goes, "It's okay. I know you did what you had to. But when I'm older, I'm going to get you back."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your first nemesis!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My first nemesis!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is a twelve year old girl! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give her a little chin (weak punch sound).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, why? No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three of them stand up and give a nod, wordlessly look over the rest of you with a smile of thanks, and Bosun looks to you and makes eye contact and goes, "Take care, brother. It gets tougher for us up north."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll keep that in mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And they all leave the inn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, she's had a thing the entire time. There was a little while I thought she was in on it completely.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, she might have been.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've known her for years. I just assumed that she was in on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She could've been in on it, and just got right away with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. That would be great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For her, yeah, I mean I got to give it to her, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, no matter what you pick, you're always welcome, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wherever you end up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe for a little bit, but I've got some things I need do, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys want to travel with me and Fjord?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where are you going, again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Up north. Northeast to the Solstryce Academy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Straight there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Northeast. I've always wanted to go there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where's... where northeast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (chuckles)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well technically, you don't have a map.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should really get a map, you guys. I haven't spent a lot of time in this area and I don't really know where we're going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're kind of going from town to town and asking as we go. Afraid we don't know too much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if there's a place-- maybe at the general store? They would have a map? Or do you have to go to a map maker?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Traditionally, you have to go to a map maker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Traditionally but it can depend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We might have a bit of something at the circus, I don't know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would love a map.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll go looking for things tomorrow. We can go shopping.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. We'll go shopping with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are you guys heading off to? Seems like people are making pretty big plans.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's safety in numbers, you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Took the words out of my mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, don't you want to travel with us, too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Um, is she coming?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, she just said she was.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, are you scared of me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A little bit. You're very big.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I thought you were Nott, the Brave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. No, there's no comma.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. You know, Nott and I have been travelling together for a while and two is better than one, although still very difficult.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long ago was it that you guys broke out of prison?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uh... you know, it was six months ago, about. Five, six months ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn, you guys are doing good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Five or six months ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that was so close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to roll, don't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll either persuasion or deception. You can choose. Don't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll do persuasion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's uh, I don't know where on my character sheet is. That's also a 14.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so seems on the level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Broke out of prison? That's very impressive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it was a bad place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Were they going to kill you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We would have died, for sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But you guys were there together? Because you knew each other before?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, first of all, she's being modest. It was not just me at all, I could not have gotten out of there without you. I don't think you could have gotten out of there without me either but you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true, for sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's why I said two. Better than one. One is the loneliest number.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That you'll ever see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's nothing wrong with being alone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, normally I wouldn't feel comfortable talking about shit like this but you are all very shifty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm very trustworthy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, no, you're shifty as well. Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the short time we've spent with you, you seem to be very upstanding folks. I'm sure it wasn't for anything too serious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, nothing serious at all, really. I was too curious. She was maybe a little thirsty. You know, petty stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they treated us very badly and we needed to get out of there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all know how this country works.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And where was 'there'?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, is there anywhere we should stay away from on our travels?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (clears throat)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any place is-- I mean, we've been travelling around a bit but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I wouldn't go west, maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Northwest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm told east is bad too. There's monsters.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah and they're pretty terrible in the north. That's no secret.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we go south?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It just depends where in the south, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd be happy keeping a bit of a low-key existence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean we are vigilantes so it's best if we, you know, have our secrets.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some of us are a bit sketchy with the law.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mollymauk, you're comfortable leaving the circus? You are very-- you have a lot of flair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I figured if you're going to live your life, you're going to live your life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (jingling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does do that. There's nothing wrong with living your life. You only get one of them, or mostly. And your days are going to be the days that you're going to have and I'd like to keep living my life the way I'd like to and keep off of certain radars.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cheers to that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stupid phrase.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That doesn't make any sense at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really stupid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who said that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That felt so good. That's catharsis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha, anywhere that we should avoid for you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know. I'm just-- I'll make my way wherever we go and maybe I'll not stay with you the whole time but I don't like, you know--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Being confined.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I don't-- groups and things--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you claustrophobic?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Uh, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You mentioned the smaller cl--cramped space in the cell. Just curious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Clamp space?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Clamps-- clampy space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Clam space.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I like to have my freedom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, technically this is a group. You mean groups bigger than this group or is this group too claustrophobic for you or-- ?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. I don't mean it like that. I just want to make my own way sometimes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not tied down to anything but that cloak, am I right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (chuckles) Yeah, that's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Speaking of cloaks, mine smells really bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was on top of a head. Ugh, that's really gross.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go try to find somewhere to wash it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Upstairs at the end of the hallway is a communal washroom. You can find space there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This place where I'm going to go wash some stuff. You could use it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You smell fine.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: (chuckles)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like you just the way you are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're bloody now, too, in addition to being stinky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should probably get that patched up, actually, though. That is fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (clears throat)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I suppose we should all go to sleep and then if any of us are here in the morning, we'll set off together?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That seems fair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There should be some spares.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have time to-- look at this, we're making plans with friends, that's amazing. Do we have for errands in the morning? I have a couple stops. Nothing major.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take me a while to pack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys want me to tag along with you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you weren't too anxious to run off anywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (chuckles, clears throat) No. I'm free on my backpack tour. No plans.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Any sightseeing we should schedule along our way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe avoid Zadash just because I just came there, you know. Don't want to hit the same place twice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zadash?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Note, note, note.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Beauregard?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the Archivist who was there earlier during the trial in the stockade. "It's been difficult to find you. Do you mind if we speak?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Zeenoth! Hey. It's been all of about twenty minutes since I've seen you last.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, um, would you walk with me? I believe we have much to discuss."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You all right with this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's cool. I've got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't care. We're not that attached yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right then. This way please, Beauregard."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More mine, more mine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau leaves and you guys are able to go about the rest of your evening to rest however you see fit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Way up after Nott has gone, I go over to Norda. Is Norda down there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yorda.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, there's two people with rhyming names.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yorda is the bartender.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yorda is the bartender.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is revenge for Vex and Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and Purvon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I find the purveyor of the establishment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yorda.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mork from Ork, that's what I said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, what can I help you with?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excuse me, is there-- I know you have a bath here, but is there a hot bath place like a bathhouse? I'm bruised over every inch of my body and I'm in a lot of pain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, that'll probably be in the Hillsward. It's a bit pricey, but I don't know if it's open this late."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, but how much are we talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I'd put it maybe somewhere in the neighborhood of five silver for a bath."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's expensive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you get bathed like proper, multiple people bathing you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Northward, you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, Hillsward."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, no offense to you. Their clientele is a bit, upper class."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not worried.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Alright, fair enough."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Danke

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Beau, as you exit with Zeenoth. As soon as you step into the night air, a second figure flanks your other side. The hooded figure from earlier that had caught you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just look at Zeenoth and go really? Is this really necessary?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is only because it's been so difficult to find you. I had to call in a favor. Please, come with us. We have a warehouse."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have to with this guy? He fucking-- look at him. He looks shifty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head turns to you in the hood and you see dark elvish features. A bald head as the hood comes back. What looks to be a female elf of very lithe form who turns to you and goes, "Actually, it is a woman, but I'll ignore that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, you're super covered-- literally saw no features until right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is fine."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I smell bad y'all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn that shit glows!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have some golden Evish stuff there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty and you can choose the wood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait for them to notify you over the break and we'll come back with the winner when we return.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They gave us an amazing matching set with the Elvis-- Elvish for our wedding. It was super sweet. Thanks Wyrmwood. Elvis from Memphis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The winner is Piamo_Feddie! If I am reading this correctly, Piamo_Feddie. Congratulations! Danoba will get your contact information, we'll get that sent out to you. Well done, and happy Valentine's Day. Now jumping back into the game, I would like to ask everyone but Marisha to leave the table, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See you, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't die!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is so scary! So nerve wracking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beauregard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a slight opening on the side warehouse doors where you had previously worked when you first arrived at Trostenwald, and Archivist Zeenoth gestures for you to enter. "Please. If you don't mind, my dear."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? Is this what got me caught, working for these fucking assholes? Ugh. I walk in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a single glowing lantern that is currently hanging from a rope that is strewn across the ceiling of the warehouse that gives a central source of light to the room. It causes the shadows to stretch out very long across the sides.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk in and turn around, the door is closed. The two figures approach. The female elf goes and takes a chair and sets it in the center beneath the lantern. "Please, have a seat."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd prefer to stand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She just sits back, about 20 or so feet, and leans against one of the large stacks of crates as Zeenoth approaches you. "Now, Beauregard. You have been what the Archive would call a problematic student."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've had to pull in quite a bit of a favor--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. (laughter) Keep going. I'm listening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Since I have been assigned to your tutelage, overseeing your progress and training, you've shown great promise, in many ways. You're a seeker of truth, and you have a keen sense for manipulations and falsehoods. Correct?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When the Archive took you in at the behest of your family, you agreed to undergo our discipline. Our lifestyle."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I didn't agree to shit. You took me in because I'm assuming my father paid you a pretty nice sum of coin to make sure that you took me in. I'm assuming that coin is no longer coming to the Reserve, so, why do you care?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Believe it or not, not everyone does what they do in this world for coin. We see possibility in you. We, wish to prevent you from blowing out your own flame. Your tendencies clash with our teachings, your dislike for authority."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thought I was doing you a favor by leaving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the woman from behind says, "Your dislike for authority is not a bad thing. It can keep you alive. Authority should always be questioned. Those with more power than you should be held to a higher standard."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, authoritative figure who I am unaware of your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, Zeenoth picks up, again, says, "But the way of the Knowing Mistress has an order of learning. Your patience is essential to adhering to this path. I know it may not be stimulating at times, but we must prepare your mind if we are ever to prepare your soul."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'd say that sorting books and punching brick walls repeatedly can definitely not be stimulating at all times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cannot reach her. Go." Zeenoth looks hurt. "I apologize that I failed you." He turns around and heads back towards the warehouse doors, which shift open, and close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fuck was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The woman now steps forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like he made me look like an asshole, feel like an asshole. Fuck, maybe I'm an asshole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because sometimes you need someone to be an asshole to get shit done."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Being nice never did. What are we talking, stranger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am Expositor Dairon, of the Cobalt Soul."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dairon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: D-A-I-R-O-N. "I take it you have heard of our station through whispers."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I figured it was always real. In my opinion, the best way to hide in a secret organization is by having a boogie man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are the hidden strength of the library, you are not wrong. We wade in the filth of society. We weed out the corrupt. We pursue the secret evils of the world, and expose them to the light."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We twist the arm of the unjust, until they spill their mysteries. We are the spies. We are the hunters. We are the watchmen to those who rule. We are not kind. We are forthright. We are truth. Do you, Beauregard, want to see the truths of the world?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just, oh god. Is that a magical talent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer ten points of bludgeoning damage as, out of nowhere, her fist hits you right across the side of your face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It takes me to the ground. That takes me to the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're unconscious?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, just takes me to the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. "Are you listening now?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have a choice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me be your teacher."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, boy. Is that what I have to look forward to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. What do you want to do now, that that's happened?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I kind of want to fucking punch you back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then do it." "What's stopping you?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now you have my attention. And I fucking punch her in the face!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a straight unarmed, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 12 total, not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She dodges out of the way, and as you move past, plucks you in the back of the head with a knuckle. That hits. You take one point of bludgeoning damage. It's a very light tap.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ow! What the fuck, my dad used to do that type of shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, she rushes around with a rapid pace to the front of you, feints with an upper cut, and then goes to elbow you in the side of the head. That is a 16. What's your armor class?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That misses. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses. You manage to duck out of the way of it. She goes, "Good. Good."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got to add some points here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come on."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, first one. Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second one. Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two natural 20s in a row!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have anyone sitting next to me to confirm this, but I swear it's a natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I can see it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take a picture if I have to! A natural 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage on those first two!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. You double the dice, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Roll the dice, double it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. That was a three, a two, so five, ten plus eight. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of damage. Then the third strike that hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One, so another five points. God fucking-- Thinking of my dad, after she just went "boop," something just popping the back of my head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last one--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a wild backhand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, hits. Okay. You take three points of bludgeoning damage, one per hit. Pop! Pop pop! She is basically going full in with the strike, and is just prodding you with these gentle little hits, showing control, showing that she's entirely able to overwhelm you, and she's hitting different places on your body, strategically. Because with each hit, you feel this burst of numbness in those vicinities. I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not great. That's a natural seven, so ten total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. After each hit, you gather yourself for a second, she stops and goes, "You are quick, and there is intelligence lying in there. You are also quite nimble at dodging blows. Do you see, with but a few simple strikes, I'm able to extract from you everything I need to know about you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck, why can't I feel my hand? What did you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You see, brute force has its place. But precision, and intent. That can take down the greatest of mountains, by poking the weakest point. Now, I know where your weak points are."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't know shit about me, bitch. I'm going to take another attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a three. That's a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be-- She can do that. Ducks out of the way, and immediately uses a reaction to smack you in the head for one point of damage, another bludgeoning point. She's going to spend another ki point to do another reaction. She can also do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll. I rolled a 15 to attack. Second attack. These are two attacks, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For your second one, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the second one does hit. She does not get the second attack. Roll damage on that second strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Attacking her with the first one, and then I'm just going to duck down a little and jab her right in the ribs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What was the damage on that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight damage, nice. You crack her in the ribs, and the impact actually does catch her off guard. She ends up tumbling five feet backward across the ground, catching herself in a three-point landing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I back up. I'm going to spend another ki point to do my defensive stance. Patient defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Patient defense. You go into that stance that she was in earlier, but holding it for the entirety of this. Her eyes narrow for a second. You see her looking at all the different points that she struck on you earlier, like she's reading some sort of a docket on what your physicality is. With that, she doesn't run at you, she runs around you in a circle and begins to jump off the sides of the boxes, some of the crates that are stacked up nearby. You watch them wiggle as she puts her weight up against them, leaps off--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Instead of getting distracted by her, I just listen to her and look at her out of my periphery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Eventually, she uses her momentum to climb to the top with her feet and leap off, then come downward with the knee towards you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right as she comes down and I'm going to use-- Oh, wait, dodge? Go first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're already in your defensive stance, so her attack's at disadvantage against you. The first strike. 19, 20 to hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss. It says patient defense, spend one ki point to take the dodge action as a bonus action on my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, what the dodge action does is it means any attacks against you have disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The third one does. Two hits still get you. Both one point of bludgeoning damage. The knee comes down, and right as it cracks into your head, she shifts to the side and glides off, and as soon as her body glides off, her back is to yours, and her spinning elbow goes and cracks you in the side of the head, but it stops short, just barely hitting you. She's toying with you at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said two more points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 11. No, sorry, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This time, opposed to the pressure points being hit, there is the one smack on the side of your head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This pain surges through the side of your temple, and travels through your spine, to all the points she had hit earlier, and your whole body tenses and seizes for a second. Your vision blurs, and your mouth stammers, and you're stunned for the next round. As she lands behind you, and walks around to the front of you, you're unable to, you can't move, you can't speak. "I can start you on this path. You can return to your wanderlust, your allies. Our kind learns more in the world than in a library. Agree to my instruction, to use the skills I teach you, as you return throughout your journeys. One day, you too, can become an expositor." You begin to regain control of your senses, and your speech begins to slowly return to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I got to hand it to you, that was awesome, and I want to know how to do that. You beat me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Your first lesson begins now."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. (groan)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She snaps her fingers, and you watch as Zeenoth steps back in, sheepishly. "Is it over, my dear? Is it done?" "I need you to stand here for a second, Zeenoth. I need a body. Let me show you the proper pressure points." Zeenoth's eyes go wide for a second. "I don't believe--" "You owe me a favor. I found her for you, did I not?" Zeenoth sighs, sags his head, and takes his cloak off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab that stool, and I drag it over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, depending on what you wish to learn, there are different places where you can pull the information from the body." Over the next few hours, working with you, and over time--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does she beat the shit out of Zeenoth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, Zeenoth. Sorry. God, we're such assholes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Assholes that the world needs, from time to time."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll work on that one together. We'll work on that. That's good, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll return to Zadash in the morning. Take what I have taught you. "When you feel it's time for more tutelage, return to me. Do not worry. I have an eye on you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I do until then, do I just continue--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do what you must. Travel the world. Use what I've taught you. Learn about injustice. Those you don't trust, follow them. Bend them. Make them tell the truth and admit their guilt. Find where ever corruption is. Root it out and let the system do its job. If the system isn't doing its job, destroy the system."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are you doing this? Why me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because a long time ago, I was a wayward girl with no direction, was angry, and fighting at the world. And someone did this for me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't really believe in systems or being a part of them, let alone a system that takes down other systems. Seems almost hypocritical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps. Who knows. Maybe one day you'll find the corruption inside our own."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Touche.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go. Get some rest. Clean up a bit, I think you could use it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You might have broke my wrist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His unconscious body on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bye, Zeenoth! Zeenoth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (coughing)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zeenoth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh dear."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Goodbye. I have such great pleasure in saying goodbye, and good riddance."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's bring everyone else back in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, friends. How's it going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you alive?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sure everything went according to plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quiet dignity and grace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fresh smells of cooked meats, and the sounds of various patrons below in the inn tavern floor, rouse you to the morning. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, guys. Sorry I snuck in last night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How does she look?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's beat to shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck! Did you get horse kicked?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Several times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn. How's the horse look?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Horse is fucking dead. I ate it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a bit excessive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Horse is fucking fine. Hey, Jester, do you have a bandage? Do you have a thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes! Of course I do. I have a lot of bandages because I am the cleric.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if that bone's supposed to be sticking out of that part.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I'm going to open the medical kit and rummage around. Pull out some stuff. Give me your wrist! I can definitely heal this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bet Yasha can pop it back into place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just made a bow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was string and mime.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you made it worse!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (blood gushing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's actually fairly well made; it gives some nice support to it. I mean, it's more of a sprain than a break. But it helps offer some support to it. It'll heal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've had some sprains that feel like breaks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no, it hurts like a bitch, or it did last night. Or it feels a little better today, but that's definitely going to help give it some support. Good job.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What happened to you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been practicing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not you, her. What happened to

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, it was a great night. I had a great night! I haven't had a great night in a long time, you guys. That was a great night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the guy you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You came in really late.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to see the other guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I might have been accepted into, like, a secret society. It's kind of secret society business. It's hard to talk about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you allowed to talk about it? Tell us about it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! No, I can't. It's fine. There are these monks. I thought they hated me. It turns out they like me. Turns out they want me to become a part of their gang. But it's not really real, and they're like, "Just keep doing your thing! But you're against injustice and seek out truth and break systems!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are a hero!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this one of those dreams where nobody has their clothes on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, if the monks beat you up to make them join your gang, they're not really your friends.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I said something like that to her. It wasn't as black and white as that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that why they did that to your face there? Oh, no, they didn't. Apparently they were pretty--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would say she's definitely a badass. I wouldn't say she's my friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This woman, was she with the fellow that you left with last night?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was. His name was Zeenoth. He's an archivist of the Cobalt Reserve. Lot of books there. Lot of books.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cobalt Reserve. He was in the court.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Was this a test of some sort?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you pass? I mean, they made you a hero, so obviously you did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's more like a vigilante! Like what we said! Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so great. Can they let us into the secret society too?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you know, this is very fascinating, but I have some errands to run. Nott, would you like to run errands with me? We are totally coming back and not leaving on our own undercover.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bring it on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need an insight check to know that that was shady as fuck?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Persuasion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to tell me what you're rolling!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a natural 20! Whatever. I'm being very honest! We're not going anywhere. But I do have errands to run. So, we're going to leave soon. Have some breakfast. I grab some bacon from Ford/Fjord's plate, and grab Nott and head out the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Meet us at the circus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to draw in my sketchbook a drawing of the devil toad head rolling along the ground like a bowling ball.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: She really did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, kind of. I put the little bowling ball things on there. And he's going to run into all of us, in chains, being knocked down like pins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll a dexterity check. Why not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight-- No, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very well done. There's, like, hatch mark shading.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I did get really good training, so it's good that I know how to do shading.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what are you guys doing? The rest of you, while they rush off to go about their errands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Apparently eating less of my bacon, motherfucker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pack up and head back to the circus. Start getting things together.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I think I'll join you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly and Yasha are heading back to the carnival grounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to go try to buy a map.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I did actually want to see that map.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll meet you there. Actually, you know what? I want to see you see that map.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think that's a great idea. Seeing me see a map is something pretty special.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's gorgeous. It's fabulous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, where are you heading off to?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have two places to go. The first, we're going to the Burnished Bibelots. The second is a surprise. But I know that I whisked you away in a hurry the other day and you weren't done browsing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds lovely and I would like to browse there again, but, honestly, Caleb, I am very worried about you. You have passed out twice in the last few days, and unless we get you a healing potion, there is no promise that you will still be alive tomorrow. I think we should go to Natural Remedies. You distract the owner while I go in the back and I steal a healing potion. It's the only way to guarantee your safety.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe that's the third place that we go. I will point out your point, which was that these crazy bastards are very distracting and strange, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So they could be my healing potion, you know? We'll talk about it. Third place. So, drag her off to the Burnished Bibelots. Boom, in the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head inside. It looks as chaotic as you left it. You see what looks to be a small bowl of heated porridge that's gathered on the counter, and cross-legged on top is the fantastic gnomish purveyor of the interior, Oglen. "Hello?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good day to you, sir!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good day to you as well."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give Nott a little shove over towards the shelves and walk up to him, right up to the counter. What are you eating there? That looks good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Breakfast."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [aside, quietly]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All sales are final!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, here's the thing. I have read this book and loved it, and if you would like to purchase it for the low, low price of one gold, you can sell it again. You sold it to me for three. You have it back for one. You can turn a profit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as some of the porridge is spilling out the side of his mouth, and he rubs it off. "All right." And he pulls a gold coin out of his pouch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a good decision, and it was a good book. I am grateful for the knowledge you have imparted upon me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Might I have the book?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, grandfather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All sales are final."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right. You will not sell that back to me, for sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you want it? I can sell it to you for three gold."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good price. Nott, how are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (chewing) Bacon's really good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All done for the day?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking around for something to swipe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check. You guys keep just shaking down this poor gnome guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do find one art piece that looks like it's a pretty good art piece with a decent frame, might be worth a little bit, but that's the best you can find. Everything else here looks like it's the dingy side of the Salvation Army.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything small? Ooh! Can I find my old flask that I left here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, I'll let you do that. It has not moved from where you placed it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to steal back my old flask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is that little dancer toy? Between the three red mushrooms on the shelf behind you, is that a music box there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is a music box." He takes it and cranks it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was a music box."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's lost the magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can fix it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long would that take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He breaks it open, looks inside. "Three days."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey Nott, are you ready?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Good day to you. Happy sales.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Happy sales, as well."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. Out the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he did not notice at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to head in the direction, dragging my goblin friend with me, to that fancy bathhouse that was described to me last night at the Nestled Nook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way southward. Go ahead and make a general charisma check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Charisma check? Well, something I wanted to do before we got there, was going to do it maybe in an alley, but you tell me, is I would like to cast Disguise Self on myself. Presumably gone into an alleyway so no one sees me doing this in the middle of the road. I take the form of a man in very fancy green robes, beautiful blond hair, very handsome man, with a vomit stain down the front of my clothes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Specific and easily done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I drag my little friend along with me. You are going to like this, this is something very special.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm excited.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, charisma check. Straight charisma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Straight charisma. Add your modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11, okay. With your Disguise Self form, it's easy enough for you to ask a few questions, and eventually you are given directions to what is called the Warm Dew Bathhouse. Warm Dew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Warm Doo, D-O-O.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: D-E-W.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dew, dew. There's a liquid u in that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Warm doo. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, let's enter this establishment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For as far south as this is, it's pretty decent compared to the other areas. Most of the Hillsward-- you get the sense that a lot of the rural farming community that fills out most of Trostenwald, a lot of the money that gets made goes directly to the central portion of this ward, where this bathhouse is. It's small, but it's really well put together. As you walk inside, you can see there are marble busts set on the sides of the entrance way, each side. You can see nice tapestries that are pulled back over the windows, and as both of you walk in, you see this young man, maybe his mid-twenties or so. Human, but he looks very thin and sickly, like he had a rough upbringing, and his general constitution has suffered for it. He has a warm smile, and he's wearing these long white robes with what looks to be a yellowish scarf that's wrapped around as he approaches. "Hello and good morning. Can I help you?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, one moment. (quietly) Stay close to me and let me do the talking. (louder) Hello, please, don't focus-- my daughter is shy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm very sorry."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've had a terrible day. Some disgusting derelict has vomited all over me, I smell like filth, and I would like to spend a couple of hours in your finest bath. Maybe not your finest. A good bath, for a couple of hours. My daughter and I. I will need adjoining baths, if you have that. For modesty's sake, my daughter and I.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That can be done. Of course." Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (humming) There's a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For two hours, that will run-- for two baths adjoining, we'll put it at eight silver pieces."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine. I definitely have that. I take out the eight silver, I slap it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wonderful. We'll show you to your bathroom."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Come along, dear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Vater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are escorted to what-- It's really off-putting for the two of you. Not only is the smell clean inside here, but there's the scent of lavender in the hallway, and you hear soft music in the distance. As you walk past, you do see that there is a resident violinist that plays, and you guys are led to these two--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is really nice!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They got a violinist over there! I'm sorry, zey got a violinist over zere, Vater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's meine Liebchen. I'm hoping for a hot bath for the both of us. It has been a long bit of travel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right this way." Leads you into the chambers. There is a glass, fogged window, so the sunlight comes through, but no one can see through. There are some linens set out, a towel, and two basins that are freshly filled with steaming water. You are left into the chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they separate, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're separated by a small wall that's eye length, but you can still talk to each other over it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excellent. This is called a bath.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've heard of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A hot bath. We have been pretty dinged up for the past several months, and we might not get back into something like this for a while, so I want you to enjoy it. Go over to your side, and I will be here. Nott, I'm going to do a bit of reading.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While you bathe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll still be the same Caleb when you're done, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I will be the same Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've just gotten used to you, and now you're going to change a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trust me, I will not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Once she is clear of the wall, I'm going to start actually disrobing, although I guess the illusion stays.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The illusion stays. Strangely, clothes start apparating out of you. (slurping)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a bad video game glitch. Bad texture glitch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, I'm probably going to go quiet for a little while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem. I'll just be over here, you know, bathing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Enjoy it. I find the second book and examine it. Am I able to read this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those would be Arcane Lock and Unseen Servant.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So. All my actual clothes are off. I'm going to take the book and set it on the edge of the basin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you paid for it, there is a hinged, small desk piece where food can be eaten, or drinks could be served while people are taking a bath.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [exhales]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you hear over the wall (gobbling).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look around for anything in the room that can be stolen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plenty of things, actually. No one's watching. There's a vase that's really nice. The doorknob itself is a brass, gold-like material.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll start working on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using your thieves' tools, you can get that free, if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: After a while, I put a toe into the water, feel it, and I'm like: Nah. I'll use my empty flask and fill it up with water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You get a water flask.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then work on the doorknob.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a thieves' tools check, adding your dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add the dexterity and your proficiency.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. With very little sound, the doorknob comes off, and you have now a solid brass doorknob. There is the vase.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a big vase?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like that big. It's more of a decorative flower holder over by the window.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. I'll try to get that too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy. You get it. There's nobody watching you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll also save the flowers in a separate pouch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any towels. Ooh, you know what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the linens can be taken.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take one towel and tear it into shreds, and use it to replace any of my bandages that have worn or fallen off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough. There's some nice clean bandages. Good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Completely quiet. And read in peace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you guys are taking a bath, the rest of you are going off on a shopping trip. Except for you, you're going to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm going map hunting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. You're going. Who's all going together?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to ask Yorda if there's a map maker in town.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or if she can draw us a map of how to get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You could ask the general store, or you could maybe go to the stockade. They have maps there but "they use those. You might be able to pay enough for them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to go back to the stockade.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then maybe check the general store or any of the strange book places might have something "old and lying in the back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, what strange book places?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, let's see. There's the Hillsbrook Parchment and Binding. There's the Burnished "Bibelots, that I think one of your friends has already been to. Those are the two strange book "places. I'm not much of a reader myself, so I couldn't tell you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you draw me a map of how to get to those places?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've already been to the general store.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, you're right. I guess we can try that place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can still make her draw a map. I don't want to rain on your parade. I'm sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just shit all over her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I totally did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you directions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go on a trip!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you guys going first?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) General store!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've been there before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) I want to buy another health pack!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Health pack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I meant a healer's kit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The general store doesn't like us very much. Oh wait. That healer's kit, is that the one you bought when we were together?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You spent way too much money on it because I changed the tag?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. That one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was great. Now I have it. Cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You won twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything's coming up Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, let's go back there. They don't like me, but let's go back there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can just pop in if you want to wait outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: MARISHA, Yeah, but they like money. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see on far end is Harper, the older woman there, standing and looking out at the rest of you. "Hi, can I help you? What are you looking for?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are looking for pickles, did you get any yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, we don't sell pickles here, sorry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Most general stores have pickles, this is the only thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're not wrong, generally, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can order some pickles, if you like."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you probably should. I think you would do well if you sold pickles. Do you have maps for sale of the area?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The area? Let me check. I'll be right back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does she leave the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she does. She leaves the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't-- put your hands in your pockets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't put my hands in my pockets, got it! I start running around and just moving everything on the shelves again the same way as before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're just moving things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, just like moving--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please be Laura when she was five and break shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes! 18 plus five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With nary a squeak you completely rearrange in a period of about two and a half minutes most of the price cards that are dangling from a number of the tools, their placement. You guys all sit back and watch as this glorious display-- you can almost hear the William Tell Overture begin to play in the back of your head as she rummages back and forth throughout the interior of the chamber, turning things around and sticking them in the ground. It has been completely rearranged.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [old man voice] Why is this crowbar seven gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has a few papers in her arms. She goes, "I'm sorry, we don't have any maps of the local area for detail. I have a map of the Dwendalian Empire as a whole, I hope that's enough."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, that could work, I suppose. It's not what we

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This will run about seven silver."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that sounds like a good price, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I also get another healer's kit? If you have one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, mark it off. You get yourself a secondary healer's kit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, one healer's kit. She's got the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hand over the seven silver?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finally

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shut the front door!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to Goonies this really quickly here. Ready?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's beautiful! Who made this? Did you make this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I designed the layout, but the map is made by a wonderful woman named Deven Rue, who does incredible handcrafted maps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got to get a camera on this shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold it up!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Put it in the middle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take a look, it's amazing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, where are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is north, this is south.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Angle it to that camera.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What camera?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She does incredible work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, you guys, let's go all of these places.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe not

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we are definitely going to visit this place called Hupperdook.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we'll make our way up to Nogvuror. Oh man, this is awesome. Hey look, look over here! This is where I live!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There be dragons there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You live in a serpent?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, Deven, who did the map, it is her birthday today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Happy birthday, Deven!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn, this is amazing! Okay, I'll leave it up here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you pull out a real medi-kit now I'm going to be really excited. 50 bandages come flying in...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That is so beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She did an incredible job. The exchange is done, you have your map. Anything else you guys want to handle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Medi-kit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I just look around and see if there's anything interesting to buy in here, like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's plenty of tools. There are various packs of supplies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess if I bought the painter's kit then it just stays and I don't run out of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over time you would run out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I'm good on paint?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good for a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I actually approach the storekeep and say: do you know of any stores that have arcane items, things with magical properties, healing potions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, we're a bit out of the center of the country for arcane items. You'd want to go further north for that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Further north? I appreciate your time, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This town blows.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's right fucking there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we depart?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure. Thank you so much for this beautiful map. You did a really good job drawing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your map.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I also really like what you've done with the place.
