lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you very much--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go, bye! Thank you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gotta go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [bell dangling noises]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all exit, she begins to come around the counter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like the idea of you just standing there going, [bell dangling noises]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wherever we go, I'm going to bury my head in the map and walk behind everybody like a total tourist.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's the question: are we going to be able to grab a cart or two from the circus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can probably get a cart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like one of the little vardos? Can we snag a vardo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically it's

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's nowhere we can buy healing potions in this city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's Natural Remedies, which you've passed before, but not entered. It's an herbal healers establishment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's try that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very wary of this, but fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going to smell like "Sephoria," I know it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sephora.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the fancy version.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, you guys had left earlier, so as you guys head toward Natural Remedies, you guys finish your bath.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pack up. I said we're staying for an hour, so I cast Disguise Self again to keep the illusion going. I'm done, you look--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I splashed some water on my face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --refreshed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it was such a good bath. I'm ready to go now, I feel refreshed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you like it, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a once-in-a-lifetime experience.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wanted to repay you for all you've done for me for the past couple of days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Consider it paid! You look the same. Does he look the same?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The brief moment that I was in my own guise nothing changed up here, so I look exactly the way I did this morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the purpose of that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who said that? You wanted to do something, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wanted to go to Herbal Remedies and see if we could get you a healing potion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's do that, then. You lead the way. Well wait, you lead the way outside. Let's keep our little schtick going here and then off we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys exit--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Auf Wiedersehen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I trust you enjoyed your time at the bath, thank you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but we have to go. Sorry, I'm late for a very important appointment. I drag Nott right out of here because I saw no doorknob on the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a small shack, but as soon as you approach it has very strong, pungent smells of funguses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Instant headache.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. On the outside you can see, right where the doorway is open, there are strings of herbs that are tied up and left to dry out. On the inside, you can already see that there are shelves of various flora and fauna that are being cultivated for various remedies and means of selling to anybody who wants to come by and procure herbal medicines. Let's see who's handling this one, because you guys have not been here yet. As you enter the main chamber--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, I will say that on the way there that I dropped the disguise, somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a lot of fungus being grown on the inside here, and you can see that elements of it may have expanded into the corners of the actual room and it's not necessarily the nicest space to be wandering in. It seems natural. Across the way, you see a gentleman of relatively tanned skin, with darker hair that's ratty and clustered. He's in his late twenties or so, looks to be upon closer inspection partial elven blood, partial human blood, and he's in the process of carefully carving a large stalk of what looks like a fungus off of a small pot that he pulled off one of the shelves. As you enter, he doesn't even make eye contact. He goes, "Hello, please, just wait a moment. There we are. Hi, can I help you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, my friends keep dying. Do you have any health potions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have a handful, that is correct. How many are you looking to purchase?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many do you have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Four."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. That will last us probably, like, a day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you do for a living?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're superheroes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sword jugglers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why would-- Fine, who am I to ask?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look at this bruise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I cut fungus for a living."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, it's in the shape of a dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not going to ask. Four? Did you want them?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, yes. How much for four healing potions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For four healing potions," and he pulls them out and plops them on the table, "240 gold pieces."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Level two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, hold on. I open up my pack and I pour out all my money. I start counting it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you have a deal, you know, if we got all of them? That seems pretty high. Right? That seems pretty high for a healing potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha: the wheeler and dealer.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, actually, I think it's rather standard in these parts. But I can put them back."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not a healing potion dealer. What are you doing here? Like this is fascinating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I create all sorts of means of tending to wounds and loss of stamina. To be honest, a lot "of people come around here for performance-enhancing fungus."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, I feel like you can excite me. I feel like there's something that you have to show that's really exciting. I'm not entirely sure it's all about stamina, I think you've got something-- you did that on purpose. Talk to me like I'm a child, show me something I've never seen before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not with advantage, because I don't have it, but I was so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Persuasion check. 19. I'm fishing for drugs, I'm not going to lie. I've been on the road a long time, I don't remember how to do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans in close to you. "Mind closing the door?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I skip over to the door and gingerly close it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keep curious company, that's true."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I do. And we're leaving town today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those are magical words for a man of my business. Are you a fan of skein?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't actually know what that is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well," and he goes back into the back chamber, comes back with a small satchel. There's a finely dried, dusted material on the inside, it has a grayish-blue color to it. He goes, "This is "a dried and ground fungus called skein. It's called skein because when you eat it you can see "the weave of time."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that what skein means?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a woven skein, it's a joke on fate-- never mind."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought it was very clever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much are you looking to purchase?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got to be honest, I'm not made of money, but I'm always curious for a new experience.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do an insight check on this guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See if he's trying to scam us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use my criminal background?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, Marisha said that, not Beauregard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To know if he's actually giving what he's giving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? Make your insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just straight insight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Straight insight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not as good as I hoped: 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a slam dunk at level two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seems on the level, seems excited that somebody's asking about it. You get the sense that maybe he makes a lot of this either for himself or in hopes that somebody asks about it and is seemingly excited that somebody in this bumfuck town, in his opinion, would even have interest. You have once encountered this substance before, and it does seem legit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do we know if it's good quality, though? Can I give it a sample?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, this might be complicated, I think that just-- What would--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about a few experiences?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A few experiences' worth. What would that run me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey guys, we're dealing D&D drugs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry for dragging the entire audience into this. Hopefully your children are already asleep, I do apologize.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: D&D Beyond, everybody. Our sponsor for the evening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for really bringing that to earth for me. You started this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll put you in at a gold an experience, how about that?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Yeah, put me in for one. I'll try anything once.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes a small little batch of this dried, powdered fungus, and puts it into a small glass vial, corks it, and hands it over.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not going to let my friend experience it alone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's it called? Skein?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Skein. S-K-E-I-N. I believe that's how it's spelled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha, you should take it with them. Right now. It'll be fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this is not how this works. This is not how this works. We bank our moments for those moments when life is disappointing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know a unique substance when I see it, I'll take one as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One for me too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This can come in handy in all sorts of ways.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: God damn it, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The fact that you had this ready means that there is no shame here. You were ready for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right, I am not making any of this up on the spot at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, I can tell!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This guy went from the Simpson's Safeway clerk to the shadiest motherfucker in a snap of time, because of your question.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A big, purple, pierced demon walked into the room and was like, hello.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, can I help you, good sir? Yes, I can help you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the running price I've seen in neighboring towns, and I don't mean to be swindled.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I assume you'd want to go ahead and give it to us for that so that we keep this a secret.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check, with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "50 gold," and he pulls his hair back a bit, "Seems fair." Takes a potion and hands it over. He scoops a little vial and says, "And for fun." He throws it over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You fucking badass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cut to an hour later, and someone's jamming an adrenaline needle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: TPK by misuse?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somewhere around level eight, this is going to be hilarious. Somewhere around level eight somebody's going to go shopping and the rest of us are going to be like: this is now, this is happening now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This has become the longest afterschool special I think we've ever experienced.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Years in the making.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He immediately gets nervous at her mention of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's fine, she's just awful, you're a gentleman, I hope to see you again. I'm looking forward to this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll be here."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course, we never met you, you never met us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course not. I don't know who you are."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am already out the door, with a flourish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you run outside just as Caleb and Nott are approaching.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before I go out I say, nice to meet you, mister--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Davies."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The decision was still happening by the time you got to the last letter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go: Okay, Davies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'll scoop my money back into my pouch and leave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bump into Caleb and Nott on the way out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the matter, do you have a cold?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't smell bad, what did you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, ironically, his clothes do still smell pretty bad, and he still looks awful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't smell as bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, on a gradient scale, he does smell a little better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you guys doing here, are you shopping? What do they have in there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They bought drugs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is an over-exaggeration.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is an extreme over-exaggeration. We got a health potion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All of you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it was kind of a ploy to get a cheaper health potion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It worked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we got drugs on top of it. It was a win-win, am I right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you guys go in there and you buy a health potion, don't spend as much as he says, because apparently he was lying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much do they run for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Health potions were quoted at 70, but he was kind enough to understand that 50 was enough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gold pieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: North we go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: North, to the horses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have a plan for the day?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and I show them the map that we just got. We're heading that way. Can I take the ribbon that was wrapped around the map and tie it around one of my horns?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easily enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could rob the store.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have a strategy for that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we could use one of our pre-planned strategies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which one would that be? Because I was thinking about it on the walk here and I can't think which one applies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, robbing shady people is usually a bad idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we hear them doing these plans? Do we hear you guys making this plan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I wouldn't be saying this out loud if you're close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could just do the simplest: the Prince and the Pauper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's the thing, I have died almost twice in two days. We have our friends and I think that's a good way to start.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you know, we almost all got pinched yesterday.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right, we should leave town with our wits about us and full of health. Let's just go while we're ahead. Besides, I got plenty of stuff today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You and me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Okay, where are we going first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're heading north to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it this big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the size of the map.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we can stop through Alfield first and see if there's anything cool there, or-- what city was it that the academy was in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Solstryce?"

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: Soltryce.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that the name of the town?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't think it's the name of the town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, the ultimate goal, you guys, is to get to Hupperdook, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What about Yogurt?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's an afterthought.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It usually is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far off does Hupperdook look?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we have to pass through Felderwin and the Felderwin Village first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's skip that one, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, is that the one you don't like? Okay, then we'll go up through Alfield, and then Zadash, and then we'll cut across and go to Hupperdook.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that where your clan is from?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They roam about.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You don't want to go to Zadash, is that right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nah, it's cool. We can go back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's cool now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, there's a few places that I didn't get to see in my sight-seeing roundabout, didn't get to hit everything. Now that I've slept on it, I've had a change of heart. It's a nice town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long of a travel would it be to get to Zadash from where we are now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Following the road is longer, but it's safest. That'll probably be close to 200 miles to Zadash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus. We're on foot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we've got a cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have a cart. A single cart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A horse? Let's go back to the inn and ask Yorda if she knows if Alfield is a big city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have any knowledge of Alfield?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I came though Alfield, didn't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you guys traveled around. You went from Felderwin, and curved around to the Ustaloch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Zadash is the second-largest city in the kingdom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I know about Zadash that I could tell them? Can I tell them anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was the last conquered bastion of the previous government before the empire entirely took the valley.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right. Zadash is on the edge of the empire too, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was, but now it's more central. It expanded past and took over Trostenwald, Alfield, it expanded all the way into the valley.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Will you share your map with me for just one minute?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a good trick he does. He can look at it once and it will stay with him forever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While he's memorizing it, Yasha, is that your name again?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not really, but close enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got you these flowers.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a lot of drab colors. Also, maybe you won't kill me now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not going to kill you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, I gave you the flowers.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Girls like flowers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love flowers, did you get me any?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't, because you're less of a threat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't know that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was very nice of you, thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Didn't peg you for a flowers type of girl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All girls like flowers.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take the flowers and I'll put them in between the other pages, and I'll put it away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't hurt to be nice sometimes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it can, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well it hurts

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It looks like somebody was very nice to you the night before, over and over again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, she was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys, we are going to Zadash. Is that what we're saying, we're going to go to Zadash?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, let's do that. What's our goal in Zadash?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, I just need to know where we're going, okay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's on the way to the "Solstryce" Academy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Soltryce. Solstice, I can see you mixing it up. The Soltryce is technically in Rexxentrum, which is the capital of the empire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which is a lot farther.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is a lot farther. Zadash does have the only other subsidiary of the academy there, but the main Soltryce academy is in Rexxentrum, the capital. But Zadash has some connection to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unless you're a foreigner, everyone knows about Rexxentrum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it's huge. For player comparison, it's twice the size of Emon. It's a massive city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zadash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not Zadash, Rexxentrum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zadash is medium, or smaller.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far did that map say, when I looked at it? 200 miles you said to Zadash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To Zadash, roughly 200 miles or so, if you're taking the road, quicker if you take a straight line, but you're not as safe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I think it's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to walk there? Should we get horses?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a horse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many horses?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a horse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A horse and a carriage. I'm assuming it can't fit all of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, like a wagon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a wagon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll be about the same pace as on foot. At a fast pace on foot, you guys can traverse about 30 miles a day. That also means you're moving at a fast pace, so you're not being completely aware of your surroundings, you have a penalty to passively seeing things around you. But you get there quicker.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why be fast? What are we in a rush for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can sightsee.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I find careful is always best.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A couple of weeks on the road to a city bigger than this one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we all going to get along for a couple of weeks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll find out, I suppose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get along with everyone, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true, that's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't get along with anybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's also true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two weeks is not a bad test run for companions. If we don't like it, we part ways in Zadash.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, free to go at any time. As long as it serves everyone, we'll stay this way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I need to stay here just a little bit longer. But I will meet you guys there at some point?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why?! What're you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have something else to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just don't think I can leave here until I'm told I can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the authorities?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're so mysterious

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have things that I need to do--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Name one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know where we're headed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blindspot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Poor Ashley, we make her come up with excuses every time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have reasons, I can stay, I just need to converse with somebody to see where my next step leads.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know you're not beholden to Gustav anymore, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, yes, no. It's not him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it Bo? The other Bo? Is it Desmond?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it Ornna?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please, Beau, let the detectives figure this out. Is it Desmond?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it Ornna?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Ornna, isn't it? It's Ornna, I knew it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will you hold this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, of course. See? Another case cracked. It was Ornna.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we leave, is there anywhere in town that there would be a courier service where I could send a message?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are messenger services, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go find one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, okay. For the purposes of brevity, we'll say that you find a courier service that runs fast horseback all along the roads from the Empire, and then with approval, outside of it, to the south and west.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "That's where you can send it. Just send it to the inn that is the biggest one and I'll find it "there. Just address it to me. Your loving daughter, Jester. Please, thank you, I need help, "thank you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. For delivery to Nicodranas, the cost of the courier service will run you about five gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is really fucking-- She better send money, because this is eating into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's hundreds and hundreds of miles on horseback.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll give the five gold for that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is such a different world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Welcome to level... three, after tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! If we live.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While we're stopping by the post office, can I talk to the courier person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. It's a young girl with short-ish brushed hair, she's boyish and freckled, and a bit dirty in the edges of her chin, she's in the process of loading up the packs on the horse, and she's wearing simple leather armor, and looks back at you. "Can I help you?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I was just wondering if you had any incoming mail for the Baumbauchs? I said that I would pick it up on the way home, heading over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mail fraud on the way out of town.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good! 20. No. Deception? 19 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me check. Yeah, actually, we've got three small parcels on the way to the Baumbauchs there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you so much. He's going to be so happy to not have to run this errand. Thank you, bye. Oh, sorry, here you go. I give her a gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's very kind, thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have a good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hops onto the horse and takes off southward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mail fraud.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is actually the worst crime we've committed today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said how many? Three parcels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three parcels.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When you get to Zadash, maybe send me a note, or maybe I'll be there. I just have to do a couple things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then maybe you can meet us there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. That sounds like a plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have our fucking wagon ready?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wagon's ready. I've even attempted to hide some of the contraband and otherwise. I packed well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While everyone is getting ready, I wait for a moment when Fjord is on his own and everyone is busy, walk over. This group seems rough around the edges, but you seem clever. Hopefully we can make this work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we should be able to, yeah. I mean, a little guidance goes a long way. You seem to be good at looking out for Nott.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, full disclosure, I'm a little rough around the edges, but you catch my drift.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm concerned with what happens with Jester and Beau. I think, amongst all of us, we should be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's make it work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll make it work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It just seems-- you're the biggest, maybe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure you don't want to take a crack at it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could take a crack at it. The wagons be hitched, hee-haw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Use your diaphragm. Really get a yee-haw, get in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Saddle up your doggies, hee-haw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One more time, on the count of three. One, two, three. On three, I push his chest in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yee-haw!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. With that, her vocal expulsion is majestic and sudden. Make an animal handling check with advantage, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With advantage? Six. I'm still a scary goblin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sound that comes out is less of a "Yee-haw," and more of a screech sound. The horse immediately rises up and goes into a very heavy gallop, and the cart takes off ahead of you, and you all struggle to catch up for a bit. With that, you guys quickly try and saunter up, heading northward along the road towards the direction of Alfield, and eventually Zadash, as you head further into the Dwendalian Empire, and whatever fate has in store for you the next leg of your journey. We'll stop tonight's session there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley Johnson, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yee-haw.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yee-haw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we committed felonies and mail fraud. That's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quite a few. Got into a bar fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We skipped town without paying our inn fees.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We bought drugs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We bought a little bit of mold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You paid your inn fee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did pay on the way in. I did pay for a few days when we got in. I guess that is probably enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my gosh, and Sneaky McSneakerson over here. Oh boy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Who knows what Marisha did while we were out there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we got to go back and not watch that later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like the three rules of Fight Club.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, we got to shop. We got to book shop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, this is fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, thank you guys for sticking around for a less intense, more character-driven episode, these early days of figuring each other out and forming a fellowship. This is fun, I love it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bunch of assholes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bunch of assholes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys for watching. Thank you again, Deven, for being an incredible artist, and an incredible mapmaker for working with me on that. Her Twitter-- I should've had this prepared in advance! You can follow Deven on Twitter @devenrue, Mistress of Maps. Her work is incredible. She has a Patreon, which I'm a patron for, you should be too. It's her birthday, so say happy birthday to her.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Happy Birthday!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashley, come back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hopefully soon, I never know. I'll try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So glad you were here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If anybody from Blindspot is watching right now, kill off her character. I mean, don't do that, but we want her back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think any of them are watching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine. We just miss her a lot. We'll see you guys back next week. Much love to you, much love to you, and is it Thursday yet?
